description: %IMAGEREPLACED%, Some remarks on the Dacian silver hoard found at Gura Văii (Pleșcuța town, Arad County), Sarmizegetusa Regia in the Austrian map of 1804, The Mithraic Statue of Secundinus from Apulum, Being an Isiac in Potaissa. Short remarks on RICIS 616/0102 (= CIL III 882), Torma Károly (1829-1897) and the archaeological research in Roman Dacia. Case study: Ilişua, Archäologische Denkmäler in der Gemeinde Slobozia Mare, Bezirk Cahul, Republik Moldau, Detailed investigation of countermarked coinage from Dobrudja Despotat (case report)

is_part_of.title: ReDIVA: Revista Doctoranzilor în Istorie Veche şi Arheologie - The Postgraduate Journal of Ancient History and Archaeology

title: %IMAGEREPLACED%
